features:
The 12-inch TriggerPoint CORE™ Mini delivers all of the foam rolling and muscle recovery benefits of the CORE Roller, in a compact and highly portable size
Solid EVA foam roller designed for moderate compression that permits a comfortable total body
Multi-density pattern promotes blood flow to increase circulation and enhance mobility
Excellent for managing aches and pains
Delivers a softer massage than the standard GRID foam roller
Ideal for anyone new to foam rolling or who prefers moderate compression
Constructed with high quality foam and superior design that will not break down after repeated use; easy to clean
Supports up to 325 lbs
